enhanced_by.reason: The addAttributes method relies on the tag being allowed, which is set by the addTags method.
The addAttributes method may need to be tested in conjunction with the removeAttributes method to ensure that attributes are correctly added and removed.
Both methods deal with attribute safety and can be used to verify that attributes added by addAttributes are correctly validated by isSafeAttribute.
The attributes added by addAttributes can be compared with the enforced attributes returned by getEnforcedAttributes to ensure consistency.
